text: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls is a 1970 melodrama and musical movie. It is about three women who perform in a rock band, The Kelly Affair. Dolly Read plays Kelly MacNamara. The movie was originally rated X. The rating was later changed to NC-17. Roger Ebert co-wrote the movie. This movie made a lot of money. title: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
